## ✅ Checklist (author)

- [ ] I ran `make test` and all **unit tests pass**.
- [ ] I ran `make e2e` and all **integration tests pass**.
- [ ] `go vet ./...` shows **no new issues**.

- [ ] My code follows the **project’s style guidelines**.
